TopicTitle: Old pics from my 0.90 career game.

Articles.Content:
[IMGUR]ztScJ[/IMGUR]

My 0.90 career save was my favorite one. Unfortunately, the save crashed during my Mun base construction. That was the saddest moment in my KSP history.

Anyway, I brought some of my images which looks good. I was playing heavily modded game so some parts may seem odd.

And sorry for some typos in the descriptions. I corrected it, but Imgur seems unhappy with those repetitive changes.
@Dafni Thanks. It's chosen from hundreds of screenshots. So I hope they should.:D
